Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory217.png'}
{3: 'It was a perilous battle, but it ended in victory for the Arctic Route Union.'}
{3: 'Civilians rushed in to see if the residential regions were intact. Simon also left with the crowd, saying that he needed to look into something with Atiel.'}
{3: 'Leaving only you, and the Forest Guards, all lost in contemplation.'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '9', 4: "Who's Amberia?", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Just a name I never thought I'd hear again—Amberia...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'She is the sin borne by the Forest Guard...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I originally planned on keeping you out of this, but seeing as the bionics mentioned her name, I think you should know who we're up against.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Before the Punishing Virus, the ARU was also a prosperous metropolis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Even at the start of the outbreak, it remained untouched just as life was before. There were no cases in the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Some people even had no idea what the virus was. Amidst our naivety, the ARU conducted one foolish experiment after another.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '...The ARU applied the Construct tech given by the World Government to military science.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'They believed that the Punishing Virus would soon come to an end, and then the balance of the world would be shuffled anew.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'To get an edge in the new world, some of the decision makers and engineers decided to create a humanoid-hybrid Construct by the name of "Amberia".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Not only a dreadnought on its own, Amberia can also command the bionic series that came with her conception.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The bionics serve Amberia?', 3: '19', 4: 'So who is Amberia...?', 5: '20'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah. The bionics were developed as Amberia's sub-units.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We don't know much about Amberia. Only that she was eighteen before she became a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The ARU wanted Amberia and the bionics to be their perfect weapons. But they never knew humanoid-hybrids could turn out to be such monsters.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The bionics wielded immense power, but the ARU never thought that Amberia would go berserk upon her activation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The ARU became hell on earth in an instant. Amberia and her bionics ravaged the land, killing countless people in a sea of fire and brimstone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'To contain Amberia, the ARU dispatched an innumerable amount of ships and narwhals, like Derek. The sacrifices were countless...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Did they win?', 4: 'Did Amberia die?'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yes. Amberia was vaporized in a barrage of explosives, and we lost her signal. The battle was finally over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But the ARU also lost it all. Even before the ravages of the virus, this land was already in ruins because of Amberia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Afterwards, all engineers involved in creating her were either executed or imprisoned for life. As for their family and closest friends...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'They were branded as sinners.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Forest Guards...', 3: '29', 4: 'Are you the descendants of those engineers?', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yes. They were later modified and labeled as traitors of the ARU—the Forest Guards.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Some yes—others no. Regardless, we are all seen as sinners.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...But as I said, Amberia should've been killed long ago, but the bionics just mentioned her name.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Could it be just a bug?', 3: '32', 4: 'Amberia must be alive.', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Whether it's a bug or not, the number of bionics we've been seeing is already suspicious. There shouldn't have been so many left after that battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's possible that Amberia is still alive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's what I was thinking, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But that would mean we\'ve been fighting the bionics under her control and mistook them for the "Tide" this whole time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I can't say for sure about the past tides, but this one... I think we should confirm this with the captain.", 4: '1'}
